channel.title: HOME on Dorrel Redmond
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Dorrel Redmond

item.title: Hope
item.description: I was messing around with Bandlab on my phone and came up with this idea. I liked how it turned out and decided to turn it into a full song. Places to listen/purchase YouTube Music Apple Music Spotify Amazon Music

item.title: Spoops
item.description: My first creation that I was truly happy with. Prior to this song, I had made a few things, but just was never satisfied, until this came along. Place to listen/purchase YouTube Music Apple Music Spotify Amazon Music Bandcamp

item.title: Vibe With Me
item.description: Arguably my favorite song I’ve made up to this point. I had a lot of fun with it and I love how it turned out. This song is what inspired me to truly pursue my music on a more serious level and I hope to create more amazing things as time goes on. Places to listen/purchase YouTube Music Apple Music Spotify Amazon Music Bandcamp
